LanguageData.RepAllowAIHeatPushExp: Allow AI to aggressively push heat above safe levels
LanguageData.RepGivePsycastToAllExp: Allow all Humanlike NPC to potentially generate with Psycast

LanguageData.RepPsycastGainChanceSpacerExp: If above is enabled, Spacer NPC faction (Pirates etc.) have {0} % chance to gain Psycast

LanguageData.RepMaxPsycastLvAllowedExp: If above is enabled, eligible NPC can gain up to {0} Psylink levels
LanguageData.RepPsycastScaleMonthExp: NPC Psycast gain is limited to LV 1 Psylink at scenario start, and this limit increases by 1 every {0} month up to LV {1} (0 disables limit)
